bioconda.name: bioconductor-chronos
bioconda.summary: CHRONOS: A time-varying method for microRNA-mediated sub-pathway enrichment analysis

biotools.summary: A package used for efficient unraveling of the inherent dynamic properties of pathways. MicroRNA-mediated subpathway topologies are extracted and evaluated by exploiting the temporal transition and the fold change activity of the linked genes/microRNAs

bioschemas.name: CHRONOS
bioschemas.summary: A package used for efficient unraveling of the inherent dynamic properties of pathways. MicroRNA-mediated subpathway topologies are extracted and evaluated by exploiting the temporal transition and the fold change activity of the linked genes/microRNAs
